message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12000 by both parties. Considering its high quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. Would you be interested in acquiring this product at a special introductory price of $10500? This is an opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a discounted rate. Please let me know your decision soon so we can proceed with the transaction.
